description: Enterprise techniques used by Thrip, ATT&CK group G0076 v1.0
name: Thrip (G0076)

techniques.comment: [Thrip](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0076) used a cloud-based remote access software called LogMeIn for their attacks.
[Thrip](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0076) leveraged PowerShell to run commands to download payloads, traverse the compromised networks, and carry out reconnaissance.
[Thrip](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0076) has used WinSCP to exfiltrate data from a targeted organization over FTP.
